sandeep: The Sudan People's Liberation Movement-in-Opposition unilaterally voids the 2018 peace agreement after the arrest of South Sudanese vice president Riek Machar and his wife, interior minister Angelina Teny (both pictured).
varun: The Sudanese Armed Forces recapture Khartoum from the Rapid Support Forces after almost two years of fighting.
Shivani: The Sudanese Armed Forces recapture Khartoum from the Rapid Support Forces after almost two years of fighting.
